text: Scappoose is a city in Columbia County, Oregon, United States. It was named for a nearby stream, which drains the southern part of the county.A 1940 Journey Across Oregon: Portland to Rainier, Archivist of the State of Oregon. Retrieved on 2008-05-29. The population was 8,010 at the 2020 census. ==References== Category:Cities in Oregon
title: Scappoose, Oregon
